attributes.action: Ban the sale of event tickets on "Ebay"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When event tickets are released on general sale, 'ticket touts' buy these tickets, and sell them on ebay for their own profit, denying the genuine fans the opportunity to attend these events. Often these tickets are sold on ebay at extortionate prices, exceeding their face value by ten times, or more, the amount. (eg, Take That: face value £25-45, going for £20,100 for two tickets)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
